item.title: [PI] clickingbuttons reqs
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:7, topic:402238”]i took out the thing in follow player cuz it didnt work still the got same error

[7/4/11 12:01 AM]: java.lang.NullPointerException [7/4/11 12:01 AM]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.followPlayer(NPCHandler. java:2641) [7/4/11 12:01 AM]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.followPlayer(NPCHandler. java:2659) [7/4/11 12:01 AM]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.Summon(NPCHandler.java:6 9) [7/4/11 12:01 AM]: at server.model.players.skills.Summoning.SummonNewNPC(Su mmoning.java:864) [7/4/11 12:01 AM]: at server.model.players.packets.ItemClick3.summon(ItemCl ick3.java:22) [7/4/11 12:01 AM]: at server.model.players.packets.ItemClick3.processPacket (ItemClick3.java:150) [7/4/11 12:01 AM]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(Pack etHandler.java:137) [7/4/11 12:01 AM]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Clie nt.java:1895) [7/4/11 12:01 AM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:140) [7/4/11 12:01 AM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:173) [7/4/11 12:01 AM]: Game saved for player imsuperman05 [7/4/11 12:01 AM]: [DEREGISTERED]: imsuperman05 [7/4/11 12:01 AM]: [REGISTERED]: imsuperman05

here:

case 114113://floor 2 if(c.InFloor2 > 1) { c.getPA().startTeleport(3281, 2768, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage("Welcome to Dung floor 2."); } else { return; c.sendMessage("You have to finish Floor 1 first."); } break;[/quote]

You’re leaving the code of execution before you send the message (ie. the return statement).

item.title: [PI] clickingbuttons reqs
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

case 114113:
    switch (player.getDungeonLevel()) {
        case 1:
            final Location destination = new Location(x, y, z);
            player.setLocation(destination);
            player.setDungeonLevel(player.getDungeonLevel() + 1);
            break;
    }

Repeat for different levels, etc. (Note: Should be obvious that it’s pseudo-code.)

item.title: [PI] clickingbuttons reqs
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Repped 500000000 times in my heart <3

Help me with this other error

src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2663: incomparable types: int and <nullt e> if (c != null) ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:2664: array required, but int found if (npc[i] != null) ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .
I had a glitch when summoning npcs after trying to add summoning pouches
i added this into where it said the error was.

[code]
public void followPlayer(int i, int playerId) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[playerId] == null) {
return;
}
if (Server.playerHandler.players[playerId].respawnTimer > 0) {
npcs[i].facePlayer(0);
npcs[i].randomWalk = true;
npcs[i].underAttack = false;
return;
}

	if (followPlayer(i))	{
		if (c != null)
		if (npc[i] != null)
		npcs[i].facePlayer(playerId);
		return;
	}[/code]

If you want to see the glitch, just ask

case 114113://floor 2 if(c.InFloor2 >= 1); c.getPA().startTeleport(3281, 2768, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage("Welcome to Dung floor 2."); } else { return; c.sendMessage("You have to finish Floor 1 first."); break;
[/quote]

        	c.getPA().startTeleport(3281, 2768, 0, "modern");
        	c.sendMessage("Welcome to Dung floor 2.");
	} else {
	return;
	c.sendMessage("You have to finish Floor 1 first.");    
break;[/code]

Try that[/quote]
